Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello everyone,

We got the release with caching support out of the door on Friday last week.
You can install the gem using `(sudo) gem in wrest` - if you have the time,
please do try it out; we'd appreciate any feedback you may have.

Links:
Source: https://github.com/kaiwren/wrest
Docs: http://rdoc.info/github/kaiwren/wrest/master/frames#Caching
CI server: http://ci.c42.in

Thanks in advance for your time.

Best,
Sidu.
http://c42.in
http://about.me/ponnappa

--20cf3054a4b50772f8049b258544
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello everyone,<br><br>We got the release with caching support out of the door on Friday last week. You can install the gem using `(sudo) gem in wrest` - if you have the time, please do try it out; we'd appreciate any feedback you may have. <br>

<br>Links:<br>Source: <a href="https://github.com/kaiwren/wrest">https://github.com/kaiwren/wrest</a><br>Docs: <a href="http://rdoc.info/github/kaiwren/wrest/master/frames#Caching">http://rdoc.info/github/kaiwren/wrest/master/frames#Caching</a> <br>

CI server: <a href="http://ci.c42.in">http://ci.c42.in</a><br><br>Thanks in advance for your time.<br><br>Best,<br>Sidu.<br><a href="http://c42.in">http://c42.in</a><br><a href="http://about.me/ponnappa">http://about.me/ponnappa</a><br>
